upgradeAccess.upgradedToValidatedOrValidationBypassedT: To continue select an option from one of the Menus above or go to our Home page
upgradeAccess.upgradedToValidatingText:
Thank you for providing the additional security information. You may now submit business online.

In addition, we have emailed your firm's principle at admin@mydomain.com, so that they can validate your request for access to client and plan data.

As part of this communication, we have provided a validation code that needs to be forwarded to you. Once you have entered this code winthin the My Profile area of the Website you will be able to access our full range of on-line services.

Your validation code remains valid for 28 days.
upgradeAccess.downgradedFromValidatingText:
We have been unable to complete the upgrade to your access permissions because your validation code has expired.

We have reset your details to enable you to start the Upgrade process again.

If you do not wish to restart the Upgrade process now, continue by selecting an option from one of the Menus above or go to our Home Page.
upgradeAccess.validationCodeText: Your validation code has been sent to your firm's principle to be forwarded to you. Please remember this code is only valid for 28 days.
